property.name: nameTemplate
property.value: <#assign participants = node.childAssocs['route:participants']![]/><#if participants?size != 0><#list participants as participant>#{'$'}{participant.name}<#if participant_has_next>, </#if></#list><#else>none</#if>

property.name: nameTemplate
property.value: #{'$'}{node.properties['invoice:name']!} №#{'$'}{node.properties['invoice:number']!} <#if node.properties['invoice:date']??> (<#assign oc = "freemarker.template.utility.ObjectConstructor"?new()><#assign usrdate = oc("freemarker.template.SimpleDate", oc("java.util.Date", node.properties['invoice:date']?long + 3600*1000*9)?date, 3) />#{'$'}{usrdate?datetime?string('dd.MM.yyyy')}) </#if>

property.name: nameTemplate
property.value: #{'$'}{node.properties['invoice:name']!} №#{'$'}{node.properties['invoice:number']!} <#if node.properties['invoice:date']??> (<#assign oc = "freemarker.template.utility.ObjectConstructor"?new()><#assign usrdate = oc("freemarker.template.SimpleDate", oc("java.util.Date", node.properties['invoice:date']?long + 3600*1000*9)?date, 3) />#{'$'}{usrdate?datetime?string('dd.MM.yyyy')}) </#if>

property.name: nameTemplate
property.value: #{'$'}{node.properties['invoice:name']!} №#{'$'}{node.properties['invoice:number']!} <#if node.properties['invoice:date']??> (<#assign oc = "freemarker.template.utility.ObjectConstructor"?new()><#assign usrdate = oc("freemarker.template.SimpleDate", oc("java.util.Date", node.properties['invoice:date']?long + 3600*1000*9)?date, 3) />#{'$'}{usrdate?datetime?string('dd.MM.yyyy')}) </#if>

property.name: nameTemplate
property.value: #{'$'}{node.properties['acts:name']!} №#{'$'}{node.properties['acts:number']!} <#if node.properties['acts:date']??> (<#assign oc = "freemarker.template.utility.ObjectConstructor"?new()><#assign usrdate = oc("freemarker.template.SimpleDate", oc("java.util.Date", node.properties['acts:date']?long + 3600*1000*9)?date, 3) />#{'$'}{usrdate?datetime?string('dd.MM.yyyy')}) </#if>

property.name: nameTemplate
property.value: #{'$'}{node.properties['arc:rstaObjectView']!} "#{'$'}{node.properties['arc:rstaName']!}" <#if node.properties['cm:created']??> (<#assign oc = "freemarker.template.utility.ObjectConstructor"?new()><#assign usrdate = oc("freemarker.template.SimpleDate", oc("java.util.Date", node.properties['cm:created']?long)?date, 3) />#{'$'}{usrdate?datetime?string('dd.MM.yyyy')}) </#if>

property.name: titleTemplate
property.value: <#if node.properties['event:workflowInstanceId']?? && nodeService.getWofrkflowName(node.properties['event:workflowInstanceId'])??> <#assign wofrkflowName = nodeService.getWofrkflowName(node.properties['event:workflowInstanceId']) /> ${wofrkflowName} <#elseif node.properties['event:propertyName']??> <#assign propName = node.properties['event:propertyName'] /> <#if nodeService.getPropertyTitle(propName)??> <#assign propTitle = nodeService.getPropertyTitle(propName) /> ${propTitle} <#elseif nodeService.getAssocTitle(propName)??> <#if shortQName(propName)!='cm:contains'> <#assign assocTitle = nodeService.getAssocTitle(propName) /> ${assocTitle} <#else> <#if node.properties['event:targetNodeKind']??> ${node.properties['event:targetNodeKind'].name} <#elseif node.properties['event:targetNodeType']??> ${node.properties['event:targetNodeType'].name} <#else> Документ </#if> </#if> </#if> </#if>

property.name: messageScript
